description.zh: Reactive Resume 是一个免费开源的简历构建工具，帮助用户轻松创建、自定义和分享专业简历。它注重隐私保护，无用户追踪或广告，并支持实时编辑、拖放式定制以及集成 OpenAI 来优化文本表达。该平台可在30秒内完成自托管，让用户完全掌控自己的数据。
description.en: Reactive Resume is a free and open-source resume builder that enables users to create, customize, and share professional resumes with ease. It prioritizes user privacy with no tracking or ads, supports real-time editing, drag-and-drop customization, and offers integration with OpenAI to enhance writing quality. The platform can be self-hosted in under 30 seconds, giving users full control over their data.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 完全免费且开源，无隐藏费用
- 高度注重用户隐私，无遥测、追踪或广告
- 支持一键自托管，实现数据自主可控
- 可通过自有 OpenAI API 密钥提升简历内容质量
- 支持多语言使用与本地化

## 功能列表:

- 实时简历编辑
- 拖放式模块自定义
- 数十种专业和现代风格模板
- 支持单页或多页简历
- 可自定义颜色、字体（通过 Google Fonts）和布局
- 可创建适用于特定行业的自定义模块
- 每份简历可添加仅自己可见的私人备注
- 支持锁定简历防止误改
- 内置暗黑模式
- 支持导出为 A4 或 Letter 格式的 PDF 文件
- 可生成个性化分享链接
- 跟踪简历链接的访问和下载次数
- 支持邮箱、GitHub 或 Google 登录，并可启用双因素认证
- 单账户下可创建多份简历，针对不同职位定制
- 使用 ChatGPT 翻译简历内容并回导入编辑
- 支持欧洲通用简历标准（EuroPass）模板
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Completely free and open-source with no hidden costs
- Strong focus on user privacy — no telemetry, tracking, or ads
- Full data ownership through effortless self-hosting
- Enhances resume content quality using OpenAI (with your own API key)
- Supports multilingual use and localization

## Features:

- Real-time resume editing
- Drag-and-drop section customization
- Dozens of professional and modern templates
- Support for single-page or multi-page resumes
- Customizable colors, fonts (via Google Fonts), and layouts
- Ability to create custom sections for industry-specific needs
- Personal notes per resume (private to the user)
- Lock resumes to prevent accidental edits
- Built-in dark mode
- Export to PDF in A4 or Letter format
- Shareable personalized resume links
- View and download tracking for shared resumes
- Sign in via email, GitHub, or Google with optional two-factor authentication
- Multi-resume support under one account for tailored job applications
- Translate resume content using ChatGPT and import back for editing
- EuroPass standard template support
